value.title: Get data from zip files without extracting them in Power Query
value.excerpt: In todayâ€™s video, I will show you how to unzip files in Power BI. You will be able to import multiple zip files in Power Query and unzip them without having to extract them first. value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.   With the help of Power Query function, we can easily remove HTML tags from the Text in Power Query. To implement that we need to use function HTML.table() in Power Query.
